attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: road tax and petrol should be governed by M.P.G. therefore forcing manufacturers to invest in fuel saving technology, taking the average car at 48 M.P.G taxed at £100 per year and £1 per litre, if your car does 24 M.P.G you pay £200 and £2 per litre if your car does 12 M.P.G  you pay £400 and £4, why does the goverment ask us to pump our tyres to save petrol and emissions? how many MP's ride round in 1400cc cars ?

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
